content.html: I’ve had a lot of people tweeting this at me so let me give you 2 thoughts on it: 1) Making 2FA a premium service sends a bad message 2) Putting a price on the weakest form of 2FA and keeping 2 much better alternatives free is good
content.value:
I’ve had a lot of people tweeting this at me so let me give you 2 thoughts on it:

1) Making 2FA a premium service sends a bad message
2) Putting a price on the weakest form of 2FA and keeping 2 much better alternatives free is good
